name: LiveCaller – Live Call & Chat Plugin for WordPress
author: LiveCaller

sections.description:
WordPress LiveCaller Live Call & Chat Plugin

You need to talk to your web visitors. We make it happen.

Are You Losing/Dropping Customers… And Sales?

LiveCaller is The Answer! We’re the solution to all the Customer Service Issues you might not have realized you had.

Features

Web Call

Innovative software that allows web users to call you directly from website and talk to customers for free, wherever they may be in the world.

Web Chat

LiveCaller’s chat feature enables you to speak in real-time with your clients, as well as send and receive any document and all relevant information from them and create customer profiles.

Co-Browsing

Allows agents and customers to collaboratively ‘browse’ a website or web application together in real time while chatting or talking. Our co browsing service means you can distantly see the screen the customer and assist him easily and Fast

Omni Channel

Integrate with any app or social media site.

One Channel. One Inbox. One Solution.

Unite all your different customer communications inside our full-featured dashboard. Never lose a customer profile again!

Usage

Add our widget to every page of your website, including checkout page and increase sales conversion and customer satisfaction.

Requirements

The WordPress Live Call & Chat Plugin is free, but you need to be a LiveCaller customer. LiveCaller comes with a free trial, allowing you to test the service for 14 days.

Sign up on LiveCaller
sections.installation:
Automated Installation

  1. Go to your WordPress admin dashboard, then find the “Plugins” menu.
  2. Click on “Add New” and search for “LiveCaller”.
  3. Activate the LiveCaller plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  4. Click the LiveCaller menu on the left.
  5. Copy Widget ID from the registration page and insert in Livecaller’s settings page.

Manual Installation

  1. Upload livecaller-widget directory to WordPress plugins directory (/wp-content/plugins/).
  2. Activate the LiveCaller plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Click the LiveCaller menu on the left.
  4. Copy Widget ID from the registration page and insert in Livecaller’s settings page.

short_description: Communicate directly with your web visitors via live-chat, web-calls, and co-browsing no matter where you or they are!
